translation.appDescription: Customizable new tab: compose your own page from widgets
translation.title: Title

iconsPicker.customIconsInfo: Custom icons are icons which you upload for later use.
iconsPicker.customIconsAbsent: Currently, you don't have any custom icons. To upload your first custom icon please head to settings.

general.title: General
general.translationInfo: Translations into languages other than English or Ukrainian are provided by community. If you spot any mistake or untranslated string, help us fix it! <0>Here</0> is instruction how you can participate.
general.analyticsHintP1: Analytics help me to better understand how users interact with extension and which features are used the most. It doesn't share any private information, such as the content of notes or bookmark URLs.
general.analyticsHintP2: This helps me to develop a better product so I ask you to enable sending analytics. <0>Learn more.</0>
general.stealFocusHint: If enabled, this will force the browser to move focus from the address bar to this page when opening a new tab. You will be able to use the command menu (Cmd+K) without needing to move focus to the page manually (by clicking or pressing Tab).
general.automaticCompact: Automatically switch to compact mode based on screen size
general.automaticCompactModeThreshold: Switch to compact mode if screen size is smaller than
general.showAnimationOnOpenHint: If enabled, the extension will show a quick-loading animation which will hide the initial flicker of loading data and provide a better look.

customIcons.title: Custom icons
customIcons.incorrectFormat: Please provide valid file(s). Supports .png, .jpg, .gif, .jpeg and .svg
customIcons.noIcons: You don't have any custom icons yet.
customIcons.invalidNames: Some of the icons have an invalid name, please fix the names before saving.
customIcons.nameContainsInvalidChars: Name contains invalid characters, only letters, digits, - and _ are accepted.
customIcons.supportedFormats: Supports .png, .jpg, .gif and .svg. It's best to use square images between 128 and 256 pixels wide (not applicable to .svg).

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
shortcuts.closeMenuOrModal: Close command menu or modal window
shortcuts.switchToNFolder: Switch to 1st folder (works with other numbers too!)
shortcuts.addNewWidget: Add new widget to current folder

presets.title: New start
presets.cta: ðŸš€ Just give me default setup

commandMenu.name: Global Command Menu
commandMenu.noWidgets: Nothing here yet. Try adding some widgets to a folder.

requirePermissions.compactText: Additional permissions required. Click to see details.

bookmark-plugin.name: Bookmarks
bookmark-plugin.checkStatusHint: Extension will make request to page every 10-15 minutes in background to see if it's up. If server is unreachable or returns HTTP 5xx error it will be considered down. This will require additional permission. Checks won't be made while browser is closed or computer is sleeping.
bookmark-plugin.status: Page is currently {{status}}, last status change was {{lastChange}}. Last checked {{lastCheck}}.
bookmark-plugin.permissionExplanation: Extension needs this permission to work around CORS. The wording presented by your browser might be daunting, but extension doesn't change or read any data from bookmarked websites.

notes-plugin.name: Notes
notes-plugin.exampleText: Veggies, ketchup, cheese, flour, olive oil

tasks-plugin.name: Tasks
tasks-plugin.exampleTask0: Stupid walk for stupid mental health
